actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space and Technology.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Technology, Environment and Aviation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Technology, Environment and Aviation

official_title: To provide for the use of Federal facilities to demonstrate environmental technologies.

summary.text: Environmental Technology Demonstration Act of 1993 - Directs the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to establish a program to demonstrate the performance of environmental technologies at Federal laboratories and other Federal facilities. Makes U.S. companies and small businesses, nonprofit organizations, and institutions of higher education eligible to carry out demonstration projects, as well as other organizations that the Administrator considers appropriate.

titles.title: To provide for the use of Federal facilities to demonstrate environmental technologies.
